values.swoptabout:
Having 20 years of experience, Software Optima Sdn Bhd is a dedicated software company specializing in the research & development of integrated business software.
Much effort has been allocated in developing an increasing variety of I.T. related products.
Many of our clients include government agencies, education institutions, port authorities, estate plantations and customers from across various industries.
We also provides vertical solutions to industries such as oil palm plantations and timber.
